name: discordant
content:

producing an unpleasant sound Synonyms

dissonant formal or specialized
grating
harsh (TOO STRONG)

euphonious formal

melodious formal
tuneful
used to describe something that is not in agreement with something else: discordant opinions Discordant opinions prevail even among good judges. strike a discordant note formal
to look or sound different or wrong compared with everything else: The contemporary dialogue struck a slightly discordant note.
